CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 18, 1953, pg. 14 reads; " Nurses Entertain Children at Clark Memorial- Pictured here are the fine children who were separated from their parents during the regular service at the church last Sunday. Nurses on duty were Mmes. Mae Turno, Anna Jenkins, Willa Mae Thomas, Grace Barbour, Miss Clara Davis and two junior nurses, Willa Mae Kuhns and Patricia Hughes.  Mrs. Dora Mayer, a friend of the nurses, is also standing with the group.  Nurses not in picture: Mrs. Rachel Brown, Mrs. Daisy Barts and Mrs. Georgia Coats, president, and Mrs. Ruth Bland."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of women, including Dora Mayer; nurses, including Mae Turno, Anna Jenkins, Willa Mae Thomas, Grace Barbour, Clara Davis, Willa Mae Kuhns, and Patricia Hughes, looking after children during church services in Clark Memorial Baptist Church, another version
